thingsToDo.textShort: Explore lavender fields, sunflower fields and sustainable farms.
thingsToDo.imageAlt: girl walking in lavender farm in prince edward county

thingsToDo.textShort: Hunt for treasures at the Countyâ€™s many antique shops.
thingsToDo.imageAlt: old antiques shop in prince edward county

thingsToDo.textShort: There are over 40 wineries in the county, craft breweries and cideries are many.
thingsToDo.imageAlt: winery on a sunny day in prince edward county

thingsToDo.textShort: The county has incredible sunsets, so hit the beach in the evening for a picnic dinner and watch the sunset.
thingsToDo.imageAlt: incredable sunset in prince edward county

thingsToDo.textShort: Dine at the restaurants and eateries in Picton, Wellington or Bloomfield.
thingsToDo.imageAlt: great food in prince edward county

thingsToDo.textShort: PEC has a very strong creative vibe, lots of galleries, display shops and a numerous.
thingsToDo.imageAlt: art galleries and shops in prince edward county

placesToGo.textShort: Climb the world-famous white sand dunes at Sandbanks Provincial Park and take in the views.
placesToGo.imageAlt: sanddune on sunny day in prince edward county

placesToGo.textShort: Relax and take a dip at Sandbanks Beach, Lakeshore Beach or Outlet Beach.
placesToGo.imageAlt: sandbanks park on a sunny day in prince edward county

placesToGo.textShort: There are over 40 wineries in the county, craft breweries and cideries are many.
Take a drive down Long Point Road, stop by the beach or the Prince Edward Point Bird Observatory.
placesToGo.imageAlt: Bird Observatory in prince edward county

placesToGo.textShort: Considered somewhat of an anomaly, as no one has yet discovered its source, the Lake on the Mountain is a must-visit.
placesToGo.imageAlt: great food in prince edward county
